attributes.action: License all stallions in UK over age of 2 years
attributes.additional_details: Make it a legal requirement for all colts over the age of 24 months to be microchipped and gelded.  Licences for stallions to be issued by a qualified vet through Defra for a substantial yearly fee.  Premises where horses to be kept also inspected and licensed by vets annually.  Purpose - to stop indiscriminate breeding and reduce the huge numbers of neglected horses.
